questions.text_no: Hva menes med folkesuverenitetsprinsippet? (1)
questions.text_en: What is meant by the principle of popular sovereignty? (1)
answers_en: That power lies with the king
That power lies with the people
That only the state can rule
That international laws override national ones
questions.explanation_no: Folkesuverenitetsprinsippet betyr at all legitim politisk makt stammer fra folket.
questions.explanation_en: The principle of popular sovereignty means that all legitimate political power comes from the people.
questions.learnMore_no: Det er et grunnprinsipp i moderne demokrati.
questions.learnMore_en: It is a fundamental principle in modern democracy.

questions.text_no: Hvilken ideologi vektlegger frihet, marked og individets rettigheter? (2)
questions.text_en: Which ideology emphasizes freedom, market economy, and individual rights? (2)
answers_en: Communism
Socialism
Liberalism
Fascism
questions.explanation_no: Liberalismen fremmer individuell frihet, privat eiendom og frie markeder.
questions.explanation_en: Liberalism promotes individual freedom, private property, and free markets.
questions.learnMore_no: Liberalismen oppstod som en reaksjon på enevelde og autoritære styrer.
questions.learnMore_en: Liberalism arose as a reaction to absolutism and authoritarian rule.

That only the state can rule
That international laws override national ones

answers_en: That power lies with the king
That power lies with the people
That only the state can rule
That international laws override national ones

questions.explanation_en: The principle of popular sovereignty means that all legitimate political power comes from the people.

questions.learnMore_en: It is a fundamental principle in modern democracy.

answers_en: That power lies with the king
That power lies with the people
That only the state can rule
That international laws override national ones

questions.explanation_en: The principle of popular sovereignty means that all legitimate political power comes from the people.

answers_en: That power lies with the king
That power lies with the people
That only the state can rule
That international laws override national ones

questions.explanation_en: The principle of popular sovereignty means that all legitimate political power comes from the people.

questions.learnMore_en: It is a fundamental principle in modern democracy.

answers_en: That power lies with the king
That power lies with the people
That only the state can rule
That international laws override national ones
questions.explanation_no: Folkesuverenitetsprinsippet betyr at all legitim politisk makt stammer fra folket.
questions.explanation_en: The principle of popular sovereignty means that all legitimate political power comes from the people.
questions.learnMore_no: Det er et grunnprinsipp i moderne demokrati.
questions.learnMore_en: It is a fundamental principle in modern democracy.

answers_en: That power lies with the king
That power lies with the people
That only the state can rule
That international laws override national ones

questions.explanation_en: The principle of popular sovereignty means that all legitimate political power comes from the people.

answers_en: That power lies with the king
That power lies with the people
That only the state can rule
That international laws override national ones
questions.explanation_no: Folkesuverenitetsprinsippet betyr at all legitim politisk makt stammer fra folket.
questions.explanation_en: The principle of popular sovereignty means that all legitimate political power comes from the people.

questions.learnMore_en: It is a fundamental principle in modern democracy.

answers_en: That power lies with the king
That power lies with the people
That only the state can rule
That international laws override national ones
questions.explanation_no: Folkesuverenitetsprinsippet betyr at all legitim politisk makt stammer fra folket.
questions.explanation_en: The principle of popular sovereignty means that all legitimate political power comes from the people.

questions.learnMore_en: It is a fundamental principle in modern democracy.

answers_en: That power lies with the king
That power lies with the people
That only the state can rule
That international laws override national ones
questions.explanation_no: Folkesuverenitetsprinsippet betyr at all legitim politisk makt stammer fra folket.
questions.explanation_en: The principle of popular sovereignty means that all legitimate political power comes from the people.
questions.learnMore_no: Det er et grunnprinsipp i moderne demokrati.
questions.learnMore_en: It is a fundamental principle in modern democracy.

That only the state can rule
That international laws override national ones

answers_en: That power lies with the king
That power lies with the people
That only the state can rule
That international laws override national ones
questions.explanation_no: Folkesuverenitetsprinsippet betyr at all legitim politisk makt stammer fra folket.
questions.explanation_en: The principle of popular sovereignty means that all legitimate political power comes from the people.
questions.learnMore_no: Det er et grunnprinsipp i moderne demokrati.
questions.learnMore_en: It is a fundamental principle in modern democracy.

questions.text_no: Hva menes med folkesuverenitetsprinsippet? (969)
questions.text_en: What is meant by the principle of popular sovereignty? (969)
answers_en: That power lies with the king
That power lies with the people
That only the state can rule
That international laws override national ones

questions.explanation_en: The principle of popular sovereignty means that all legitimate political power comes from the people.
